[General elections](/wiki/General_elections_in_Singapore) Singapore portal - [Other countries](/wiki/Outline_of_political_science#Politics_by_region) - v - t - e The [Government of Singapore](/wiki/Government_of_Singapore) consists of several departments, known as [ministries](/wiki/Ministry_(government_department)) and statutory boards in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). Ministries are led by a member of the [Cabinet](/wiki/Cabinet_(government)) and deal with state matters that require direct political oversight. The member of the Cabinet heading the ministry is known as the [minister](/wiki/Political_minister), who is supported by a junior minister known as [minister of state](/wiki/Minister_of_State#Minor_government_ranks) in Singapore. The administrative management of the ministry is led by a senior civil servant known as [permanent secretary](/wiki/Permanent_Secretary#Outside_the_UK). ## [Ministry of Culture, Community and Youth](/wiki/Ministry_of_Culture,_Community_and_Youth) (MCCY) ### Committees/Councils -
